Package Stories

Class Herbology

java.lang.Object
Stories.Story
Stories.Herbology
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Herbology extends Story
This is an inherited class from Story where a story is slowly built and is played in Stories.

  • Constructor Details

    • Herbology

  • Method Details

    • playStory

      public void playStory(Player player) throws InterruptedException
      In this method, the first important thing is to set everything to the zero-state, since the same object can be played multiple times in one session, and it would cause bugs. Then the Stories is created using StoryBuilder. After that, the actual story-printing begins. A new Thread is created to play the story. In the thread Story.string_builder, the story is built letter by letter and then by calling "printStory(string_builder)" method is printed in the Stories GUI. After that if the whole story was printed, the Player.addPoints() is called to increment the player's score. If the player skips the story, no points are added. In the end the Story.done is set to true, to notify the class which is responsible for continuing to the next part of the game, that this class finished it's work.
      Specified by:
      playStory in class Story
      Parameters:
      player - the player
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - is thrown if there is a problem in Waiter class
